Summary: Long and skinny, red and black, very fast.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was riding my bike down a street that i see about everyday i heard a big blastthat sounded like a jet broke the sound barrior. i looked into the sky and saw a red and black long skinny thing. atfirst i didn't know what it was because had no wings. as i watched it not move for about three minutes then in a blink of an eye i went out of sight then two where it was. it turned where it was tall flew down to the heighth of these big tele phone poles and sit there for 20 minutes. it was as long of two school busses then it shot back up out of sight.during the sighting the hair on my arms stuck up.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around May 13th 2010
